about_the_game:
Night Breaker is an atmospheric action-adventure with a strong focus on exploration. The game combines platforming challenges with combat and some resource management elements, all wrapped in a deep, compelling story.





Travel through an open, interconnected world and uncover all its hidden secrets and mysteries. Explore diverse environments, experience wilderness like never before and get up close and personal with the fascinating wildlife that inhabits this untamed land.





Grab your preferred gear and forge your own path through the world with various abilities, a wide range of weapons and other useful items, and enjoy the multitude of possibilities they offer when combined with an interactive environment.
In Night Breaker, you decide what is the best solution. Would you rather look for the key or blow up the door? The choice is yours, but some decisions may have consequences to consider…





Gather resources to keep the colony running or trade the riches you find to support yourself and get great new equipment to make your adventure easier and more exciting. Use the available resources to restore power to all regions of the colony and try to rebuild it into a thriving place once again.





An immersive world filled with interactive elements, a day-night system that significantly affects gameplay, and various weather conditions — these features transform your surroundings into a living, virtually tangible environment. Get ready for a dynamic and challenging adventure and immerse yourself in this unusual world.



  • Embark on a journey through a vibrant, interconnected and open world, brought to life with a distinctive, hand-drawn art style.
  • Dive into a variety of environments, ranging from lush forests, through well-organized urban areas, to ice-capped glaciers.
  • A deep, gripping story, full of secrets and mysteries to uncover.
  • Encounter diverse creatures, face dangerous and challenging enemies, and deal with various environmental threats.
  • Choose from a wide collection of weapons, ranging from a simple but useful machete to a powerful rocket launcher, to defeat your enemies or just find your way out of trouble.
  • Unleash the full potential of an array of offensive and non-offensive equipment to unlock new paths and overcome dangers and various obstacles.

name: Night Breaker
short_description: Venture into an unusual, alien world full of danger and mysteries in this sci-fi Metroidvania. Grab your gear and face the challenge of sustaining a once-thriving space colony. Can you bring this place back to life? Are you ready to uncover all the secrets lurking in the darkness?
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Simplified Chinese
